trans-unit.source: Creates a configured instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> activity pairs.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância configurada dos pares de atividade de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> e <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Presentation.Factories.SendAndReceiveReplyFactory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Presentation.Factories.SendAndReceiveReplyFactory" />.

trans-unit.source: The workflow UI element that is the visual container of the new activity.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de interface do usuário do fluxo de trabalho que é o contêiner visual da nova atividade.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence" /> activity composed of a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> and a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> pair.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova atividade <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence" /> composta por um par de um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> e um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence" /> activity composed of a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> and a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> pair.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova atividade de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence" /> composta por um par de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> e <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" />.
